name: Status
description:
Status events report the status of a component, for example a service, application or appliance.

Report the status information in the message attribute, for example "Connection failure", "Low Disk", or "High CPU". If additional status information is required, include common extension status attributes such as status_detail, status_os, status_exception and status_stack_trace.

If reporting status for a specific process, include the Process object.
